name: Harjumaa Omavalitsuste Liit
goal: Union of Harju County Municipalities is cooperation organization for municipalities of Harju County. The organization stands mainly to ensure regional development goals.
interests: Budget, Climate Action, Communication, Competition, Culture, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, European Neighbourhood Policy, Institutional affairs, International co-operation and development, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Migration and asylum, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Single market, Sport, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives: Currently we are interested in Low Carbon Economy 2050, 2030 Climate and Energy Package, TEN-T policies, Horizon, structural funds, cohesion funds (INTERREG) etc.
